Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-52970 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.11.15-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-52970 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.11.15-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mariadb is earlier than 10.11.15-1, affected by CVE-2023-52970
